include(Reprojucer)

  message(FATAL_ERROR "JuceDemo_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

  "${JuceDemo_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)
